Access-Operator-Description: This operator is password protected. Please enter the password to access the operator.
Advanced-Description: Configure information such as broadcaster name, main computer IP, data port, and proxy server.
Affiliates-Description: Feature used by network heads that send triggers via IP.
Affiliates-DialogDrawer-Description: Fill in the fields below to create an affiliate. It will be used for network heads to send triggers via IP.
Application-Theme-Description: This applies to the entire application
Broadcaster-Profiles-Description: View and manage the profiles registered in your broadcaster
Broadcasting-Operators-Description: View and manage the operators registered in your broadcaster
Edit-List-Description: Fill in the fields below to edit your list.
Files-Allowed: MP3, MP4, and TXT files are allowed.
Language-Description: This will change the default language of your application.
Library-Description: Organize your lists and files in a practical and efficient way
License-Description: All rights reserved. Unauthorized use or distribution is prohibited.
My-Profile-Description: Personalize your experience in the system by adjusting the theme, language, and operator preferences. Adapt the interface to meet your needs and preferences.
Name: Name
New-Files-Description: Manage and view files added in the last 60 days.
New-List-Description: Fill in the fields below to create your profile list. Define a name and a category.
New-Operator-Description: Fill in the fields below to create a new operator. Define a name and select a profile.
New-Profile-Description: Fill in the fields below to create your profile. Define a unique name, a description, and select a color.
Operator-Management-Description: Manage the operators registered in the system and assign profiles that define their access permissions.
Operator-Selection-Description: Search for your operator or filter by the profiles available in your broadcaster.
Outputs-Description: Define the audio outputs that will be used for different functions of the application.
Placeholder-Description-Profile: Add a brief description about the profile.
Playlist-Server-Description: Manage your settings, preferences, and adjustments so that Playlist Digital meets your needs.
Profile-Management-Description: View and manage profiles. Profiles define the permissions and access that can be assigned to operators.
Settings-Description: Manage your settings, preferences, and adjustments so that Playlist Digital meets your needs.
Terms-Of-Service-Privacy-Policy: By clicking continue, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
Title: Title
Welcome-Description: Manage your information, privacy, and security so that the system meets your needs.
